backend/main.mo: Main Motoko actor implementing a course management system with role-based access control (Student, Management, Marketer), user profiles, course enrollment, and referral tracking using persistent storage maps.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report documenting the password validation requirement for Management role login using password '*#Sindoor@2025' in ProfileSetupModal component.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Text file containing pre-generated summaries of all frontend components, pages, utilities, and configuration files describing their functionality and purpose.
frontend/index.css: Global CSS file defining Tailwind layers and CSS custom properties for light/dark theme color schemes using OKLCH color system with warm orange/amber palette.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point for the React application with viewport meta tag and root div mounting point for the Midbrain Activation Course Marketing App.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component managing authentication flow, showing PublicHomepage for guests, ProfileSetupModal for new users, and RoleBasedLayout for authenticated users with profiles.
frontend/src/components/AllMarketersView: Management dashboard component displaying marketer performance rankings, referral statistics, and summary cards with sortable table showing top performers.
frontend/src/components/CourseList.tsx: Component rendering available courses in a card grid with unique images, enrollment status badges, course details, and enroll buttons with loading states.
frontend/src/components/CourseManagement: Displays a table of all courses with their descriptions, enrollment counts, and active status for management users. Fetches courses and students data to calculate enrollment statistics per course.
Shows a grid of course cards for courses the current student is enrolled in, displaying course images, descriptions, and enrollment status. Uses the user's Internet Identity principal to fetch their enrolled courses.
frontend/src/components/EnrollmentAnalyt: Provides analytics dashboard with bar and pie charts showing enrollment statistics, including total enrollments, active students, average enrollments per student, and course distribution. Uses Recharts for data visualization.
frontend/src/components/MarketerStats.ts: Displays and allows editing of the marketer's profile name. Fetches marketer statistics using their Internet Identity principal and provides an inline edit interface.
frontend/src/components/Navigation.tsx: Top navigation bar showing the Midbrain Academy logo, user's role and name, and a logout button. Handles logout by clearing Internet Identity and query cache.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupModa: Modal dialog for new users to set up their profile by entering name and selecting role (Student/Management/Marketer). Requires password validation for Management role with hardcoded password check.
Main layout wrapper that renders role-specific dashboards (Student/Management/Marketer) based on user profile, includes navigation header and footer with contact information and attribution. Footer displays management team names and WhatsApp contact link.
frontend/src/components/StudentList.tsx: Displays a searchable table of all enrolled students with their names, enrolled courses (as badges), and total enrollment counts. Includes loading skeletons and empty state handling.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Custom hook that creates and manages the backend actor instance based on Internet Identity authentication state, initializing access control with an admin token and invalidating dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides React context and hooks for Internet Identity authentication, managing login/logout state, identity persistence, and delegation validation with configurable AuthClient options.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for all backend operations including user profiles, courses, enrollments, students, and marketers, with mutations that show toast notifications and invalidate related queries on success.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom CSS variables for light and dark themes using an orange/brown color palette, defining design tokens for backgrounds, borders, and chart colors.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that sets up React Query and Internet Identity providers, then renders the root App component into the DOM.
frontend/src/pages/ManagementDashboard.t: Admin dashboard page displaying summary statistics (courses, students, enrollments, referrals) in cards and tabbed views for analytics, course management, student lists, and marketer data.
frontend/src/pages/MarketerDashboard.tsx: Marketer dashboard page displaying referral statistics, performance metrics, and a button to track new referrals using Internet Identity authentication.
frontend/src/pages/PublicHomepage.tsx: Public-facing homepage with hero section, course listings (basic, advanced, super), feature cards, and login button for unauthenticated users.
frontend/src/pages/StudentDashboard.tsx: Student dashboard with tabs for enrolled and available courses, displaying statistics for total, enrolled, and remaining courses.
frontend/src/utils/courseImages.ts: Utility function mapping course IDs (basic, advanced, super) to their corresponding image asset paths.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: URL parameter utilities for extracting, persisting, and clearing query parameters from both regular and hash-based routing, with sessionStorage integration.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom color scheme using OKLCH, extended utilities for shadows/animations, and typography/container-queries plugins.
project_state.json: Project metadata tracking features, issues, and pending request AR-1 for management role password validation requiring '*#Sindoor@2025'.
